utterance: Crack three eggs on a bowl and whisk with a pinch of salt.
Heat butter or oil on a pan on high heat.
Add the egg mixture to the pan and stir the eggs for about 30 seconds.
When the eggs are set but look slightly wet, turn off the heat and fold the omelette.
After a few seconds, transfer the omelette onto a plate.
Amazing! You have finished preparing a French omelette. Bon app√©tit!
Scrub potatoes well and cut into 1 cm thick fries.
In a large mixing bowl, toss potatoes with oil, sugar, salt and red pepper.
Spread on baking sheet in one layer.
Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until potatoes are tender and browned.
Good job! You should server and eat it as long as it is warm!
